New Records: LeBron James and Bronny James became the first father and son to play in the NBA together
Pre-Game Insights: LeBron and Bronny played 2 1/2 minutes on court together
The Lakers were fully aware of the history they would make with this pairing
Miscellaneous Highlights: Ken Griffey Sr. and Ken Griffey Jr. were courtside at the Lakers' downtown arena to witness the same history they made in Major League Baseball
Others: LeBron averaged more than 25 points per game last year for his 20th consecutive season
The Lakers have declined to speculate on how long Bronny will stay on their NBA roster
